text: 5:16 Godɨn Araziba 9:18-20; 1 Samuel 12:18; 1 Atriviba 13:6; Onger Akaba 34:15; Jon 9:31Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia vaghvagh uan arazir kurabar gun Godɨn gumazamizir igharazibav kɨm. Eghtɨ God ian akurvaghsɨ, ia uari bagh God ko mɨkɨmtɨ, God ia damightɨ ia ua deragham. Ezɨ gumazim o amizir Godɨn damazimɨn deraghavɨra itim God ko mɨgei, an azangsɨzim bar gavgavir ekiam iti, eghtɨ a igharaz darazir akurvagham.
